commit.message:
re PR bootstrap/47187 (profiledbootstrap failure on i386)

	PR bootstrap/47187
	* value-prof.c (gimple_stringop_fixed_value): Handle
	lhs of the call properly.

	* gcc.dg/tree-prof/pr47187.c: New test.

From-SVN: r168581

+	lhs of the call properly.
